name: Mush-Room
description:
In Mush-Room you play as a wizard trying to fight against some disgruntled forest spirits known as “Mushroom mites,” who are flooding your small home with seemingly invulnerable magical mushrooms. These mushrooms can only be destroyed by tossing them into your cauldron, which contains some unknown magical concoction capable of dissolving them. 

You play in a high-pressure, wave after wave style battle against the constantly spawning enemy, either getting over-run and losing or by clearing your home of the threat.

Credits:
Rob Meade - Gameplay Programmer
Kingsley Arriola - Animation/Rigging
Lydia Barraclough - 2D/Concept Artist
Tom Channelle - 3D/Environment Artist
